pr_title: JEP 360/JEP 384 Sealed classes and records DDR support

timeline.message:
JEP 360/JEP 384 Sealed classes and records ddr support

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Please remove trailing whitespace (at least in new code).
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Please leave a blank line between methods.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Have you verified that no tests are affected by this change?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: No. I will try it out.
replies.author: theresa-m

replies.bodyText: The OpenJ9 DDR tests are passing for me locally.
replies.author: theresa-m

replies.bodyText: As I think about this again, I think (given we're changing things) that it should not refer to 'Sun' or 'Oracle': How about 'Basic Access Flags'?
replies.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Agreed. I originally added Oracle to match the statement in rcdump.c but I think both should be updated.
replies.author: theresa-m

timeline.bodyText:
Please instead use out.format("Permitted subclasses (%d):%n", permittedSubclassCount)

%n expresses the desired newline
there's no need to build the string locally
timeline.author: keithc-ca
keithc-ca
keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Please remove all trailing whitespace in code you're adding (e.g. this line).
timeline.author: keithc-ca
keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: This comment is stale, and I'm not sure it added much value.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: I see you've completely removed the lines containing only whitespace: it's not what I was asking for, but that's ok.
replies.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Suggest you say srpPtr.notNull(), or invert.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
keithc-ca
keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Most calls to addSlot() supply a slot name beginning with a lower-case letter: why the departure here and on line 700 below?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: I will change it to lower case.
replies.author: theresa-m

timeline.message:
Fix record NAS recording

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: The length could be expressed more clearly as J9ROMRecordComponentShape.SIZEOF.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
Fix record NAS recording
